page.title: 02ARABLE FARMING
page.content: In our area the main type of farming is arable,most farms reflect this.On most farms they use a crop rotation of either 5 years or 3 years. The main crops grown are wheat, barley and sugar beet,although some farmers grow oil seed rape and pears. Straw is often produced and usually sold to local people. Before being sold the crops are stored at 16% moisture in a barn or storage bins,which can each hold a 100 tons of grain.Some bins are specially designed for drying the crops when the level of moisture is too high. Barns are also used for storing machinery,such as ploughs,harrows, rollers,tractors,combines,balers,etc.
